subject: Photography
title: Nostalgia and the Photographic Image
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Nostalgia and the Photographic Image.

hook.text: Old photos make us ache. Faded colors, soft grain, frozen youth. Photography is nostalgia's most powerful trigger.

buildup.text: Photographs freeze moments we can never return to. This gap between then and now creates a bittersweet longing.

discovery.text: Visual cues trigger nostalgia: warm tones, grain, soft focus, and analog aesthetics all signal the past.

punchline.text: A photograph can make you miss a moment you never lived.
